function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'rand'?

loop_reachability: Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i < MAX' is never executed?

dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < MAX' without passing through its header block?

data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'm (line 7)' affect subsequent computations?
Is variable 'i (line 8)' used after its definition?
liveness: Does variable 'i' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
Is variable 'j' live at the end of function 'main'?
dead_code: Is this statement not dead: “m[i][j] = rand() % 10;”?
